logs.step1_raw_spec:
```pseudocode
FUNCTION separate_vowels_and_consonants(input_string)
    DECLARE vowel_chars AS empty list
    DECLARE consonant_chars AS empty list
    DECLARE vowels = "aeiouAEIOU"
    FOR each character IN input_string DO
        IF character IS in vowels THEN
            ADD character TO vowel_chars
        ELSE
            ADD character TO consonant_chars
    END FOR
    RETURN concatenated string of vowel_chars + concatenated string of consonant_chars
END FUNCTION
```
